meanings.definition: An enzyme that breaks down collagen.
meanings.sent1: The collagenase helped to break down the tough collagen fibers.
meanings.sent2: Doctors used collagenase to treat scar tissue.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous collagenase decided to break down all the collagen in the body, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like collagenase, slowly breaking down the barriers between them.
meanings.sent5: The powerful collagenase enzyme worked tirelessly to break apart the collagen molecules.

meanings.definition: A substance that breaks down collagen in the body.
meanings.sent1: The collagenase in the lotion helped to soften the skin.
meanings.sent2: As we age, the collagenase in our bodies decreases, leading to wrinkles.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous collagenase supplement decided to break down all the collagen in the body, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like collagenase, slowly breaking down the walls around his heart.
meanings.sent5: The powerful collagenase treatment worked wonders in rejuvenating her skin.
